title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 550.7 - Policy
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 550.7 - Policy

State Regulations

It is recognized that requirements with respect to the
treatment and discharge of liquid wastes are subject to change from time to
time, and that an upgrading of requirements and standards may occur as
circumstances make appropriate. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
550.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
